abilities.name: Spellcasting
abilities.description:
The Kobold is a 3rd level spellcaster. It's spellcasting ability is Charisma (Spell Save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

Cantrips: Fire Bolt, Mage Hand, Mending, Poison Spray
1st Level (4 Slots): Charm Person, Chromatic Orb, Expeditious Retreat
2nd Level (2 Slots): Scorching Ray

abilities.name: Sorcery Points
abilities.description:
The Kobold has 3 Sorcery Points. It regains all spent sorcery points when finishing a long rest. It can spend Sorcery Points on the following options:

Heightened Spell: When it casts a spell that requires a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, the Kobold can spend 3 Sorcery Points to give one target disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.

Subtle Spell: When the Kobold casts a spell, it can spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast the spell without somatic or verbal componenents.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.description: Advanatge on attack rolls if an ally is within 5 ft of the target and the ally is not incapacitated.

abilities.name: Impius Viam
abilities.description: As a reaction, the Kobold shouts "Impius Viam" before impaling itself with it's weapon. One of the Kobold's allies within 120 feet of itself regains hit points equal to the Kobold's current hit point total, then the kobold dies.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description:
Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft or range 20/60 ft, one target
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage
